name: Independence House
description: Residential treatment facility operated by Cumberland River Behavioral Health providing comprehensive substance abuse treatment and mental health services. Offers residential treatment programs for individuals seeking recovery from addiction and mental health challenges.
source: Verified from official Cumberland River Behavioral Health website and Google search results
eligibility_requirements: Adults seeking residential substance abuse treatment and mental health services
notes: Part of Cumberland River Behavioral Health network serving Bell, Clay, Harlan, Jackson, Knox, Laurel, Rockcastle, and Whitley counties. Offers comprehensive behavioral health services including crisis intervention, outpatient counseling, and residential treatment programs.
